column2: "Kaka... I had thought that the Kuron military wasn't a match for me, but it seems they have some backbone."
"Furthermore, they're using skills I find distasteful... Really, they're quite infuriating opponents."
"I know they're not genuine, but if I think that they were once children of this star, things get difficult..."
"No, it's not difficult... This familiar sadness is what I felt that time when I died and was reborn."
"That time when all of the Kuronians and Shironians cast mother and father aside. Nostalgic."
"Well, whatever the scenario, that time was worse. That time when everything became an enemy."
"<%me>...! And Matoi! You idiots, why did you come?!"
"That's our line, idiot! We came to save our friend!"
"You... idiots! Your bodies are close to their limits! Any more and...!"
"1. That's also our line."
"2. Who is near their limit?"
"It's just as <%me> said. Sukunahime should be feeling exhaustion at levels that aren't human anymore."
"I know we arrived fashionably late, but should you just be standing around looking confused?"
"You've gotten quite talkative since I last saw you, Matoi."
"Wha...! An... Ash transfer!"
"We somehow managed to meet up."
"Kotoshiro... Why are you here...?"
"A secret art of the White King. As you said before, the coward's spells certainly are reliable."
"I know! I taught him that. I want to hear why you're here!"
"I arrived to save you, mother."
"Ch...! This guy...! To call me that at this place and time...!"
"Mother, a message from the White King. [We Shironians are weak, but will stand by the Miko.]"
"That stupid king... I see, the presences outside are those foolish Shironians."
"Yes. We're sending troops in. We'll hold the line here."
"Then, everything will be over once we defeat [Double] all the way in the back."
"Kotoshiro, take Sukunahime and retreat."
"Wh- what are you saying, Matoi?! I'll go as well!"
"With you that exhausted... To be frank, you'll just be in the way."
"Guh... That's harsh...! I'll be angry if you leave me, you...!"
"That might be true, but that's not the main reason."
"[Double] is something the ARKS... is something <%me> and I must defeat ourselves."
"Whatever, do as you like! However, I will not allow you two to die! You two, come back alive! Got it?"
"Let's go, <%me>. It's our duty as ARKS to defeat [Double]."
"Quest progress has been saved."
